title: For Separatists, Ballots Are On Their Way â€” But Plans Are Still Pending
teaser: The self-proclaimed governor of the eastern Ukrainian city of Luhansk announced that preparations were underway for an independence referendum. Separatists' intentions there appear to be unclear, and their opponents feel angry and abandoned by the government in Kiev.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
